tasks.label: Create Sitemap
args: echo 'Starting sitemap creation...' && WORKSPACE='${workspaceFolder}' && echo "Workspace root: $WORKSPACE" && SITEMAP="$WORKSPACE/sitemap.md" && echo '# Sitemap' > "$SITEMAP" && echo 'Created sitemap file.' && echo '## Root' >> "$SITEMAP" && if ls -1 "$WORKSPACE" | sed 's/^/- /' >> "$SITEMAP"; then echo 'Added root directory contents.' && echo '## /app' >> "$SITEMAP" && if ls -1 "$WORKSPACE/app" | sed 's/^/- /' >> "$SITEMAP"; then echo 'Added /app directory contents.' && echo "Sitemap created successfully at $SITEMAP" && cat "$SITEMAP"; else echo 'Error: Failed to add /app directory contents.'; fi; else echo 'Error: Failed to add root directory contents.'; fi
